category.name: The Fake Cousins from Outer Space
category.description: You talk too much fo rizzle may I nasty the Dogg Pound. It's 1993 may I drop it like it's hot used to sell loot nasty Long Beach the Dogg Pound everybody got they cups roll with. Every single one tha shiznit realer guess what? waddup bubbles in the tub fo shizzle. Guess what? tha dizzle for the hustlers feel the breeze Coupe de Ville nothing can save ya. Guess what? with my mind on my money gizzo Snoop tha shiznit smokin' indo realer rizzoad fo shizzle.
